Get data from Planit API

Source: R/planit.R
get_planit_data.Rd

Get data from Planit API

get_planit_data(
  bbox,
  base_url = "https://www.planit.org.uk/api/applics/json",
  limit = 6,
  end_date = "2009-02-01",
  start_date = "2000-02-01",
  silent = FALSE
)

Arguments

bbox

Bounding box in the form of xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax, e.g.: `c(-1.3, 53.7, -1.2, 53.9)`
base_url

The base URL of the service
limit

How many items to return (e.g. 6, default)
end_date

E.g. `"2009-02-01"`
start_date

E.g. `"2000-02-01"`
silent

Do you want a message? Default is `FALSE`

Value

A data frame

Examples

get_planit_data(bbox = c(-1.366023, 53.744171, -1.35515, 53.747495))
#> Getting data from https://www.planit.org.uk/api/applics/json?limit=30&bbox=-1.366023%2C53.744171%2C-1.35515%2C53.747495&end_date=2009-02-01&start_date=2000-02-01
